Detailed Description

Thread distributor for the line-per-thread approach.

This class collects all the information and data needed for the multithreaded backprojection and then can be used by independent threads to give them next portion of work: one line with the rotation angle of this line. I.e. it distributes the work over any number of threads.

Definition at line 407 of file kernel.cpp.
